response.overview: Wes Chandler (Jim Dougherty) is an aspiring filmmaker whose chance encounter with police detective Ron Leach (Thomas J. Smith) seems like a golden opportunity at first glance: an opportunity that quickly spirals into something much more harrowing.  Desperate to breathe new life into a failing movie he's producing, Wes approaches Ron for assistance with his dying film. Ron agrees in exchange for Wes's help with a little known project of his own.  While attempting to honor his end of their deal, Wes discovers that Ron is really a depraved cop with sinister motives. Both men are willing to do whatever it takes to win a game of cat and mouse that leads to Wes's ever increasing struggle to protect his family.
response.title: Leach
